articles.title: IATF approves PH hosting of Asian women's volleyball tilt in August - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Presidential Spokesperson Harry Roque announced the Inter-Agency Task Force's approval of the country's hosting of the Asian Senior Women's Volleyball Championship in Clark, Pampanga on Aug. 29 to Sept. 5.
articles.content:
Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, July 16) The Philippines is all set to host this year's Asian Senior Women's Volleyball Championship.

articles.title: Philippines confirms first cases of Delta variant - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Discovery of more transmissible COVID-19 variant comes amid strain’s rapid spread elsewhere in Southeast Asia.
articles.content:
The Philippines has confirmed its first locally transmitted cases of the more infectious Delta coronavirus variant, the health ministry said on Friday, with one person dying from the disease.
